resources.title: Guided Meditation for Anxiety
resources.description: A 10-minute guided meditation to help calm anxiety and reduce stress. Find a quiet space and follow along.

resources.title: Understanding Depression (PHQ-9)
resources.description: An animated video explaining the symptoms of depression and how tools like the PHQ-9 can help in understanding them.

resources.title: Calming Sleep Music
resources.description: Relaxing music designed to help you fall asleep faster and enjoy a deeper, more restful sleep.

resources.title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) Explained
resources.description: A clear, concise article from the American Psychological Association explaining what CBT is and how it works.

resources.title: 5-Minute Breathing Exercise
resources.description: A quick and effective mindful breathing exercise to help you ground yourself during moments of stress.

resources.title: What is Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD-7)?
resources.description: Learn about GAD and how the GAD-7 screening helps in identifying its symptoms. An informative video for better understanding.
